    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskRouterCapability

        public TaskRouterCapability(String accountSid,
                            String authToken,
                            String workspaceSid,
                            String channelId)
        Create a new Capability object to authorize clients to interact with the TaskRouter service.
        Parameters:
        accountSid - Account to authorize actions for
        authToken - Auth token for the account. Used to sign tokens and will not be included in the generated tokens.
        workspaceSid - Workspace to authorize tokens for.
        channelId - Authorized Channel

    • Method Detail

        Allow fetching all subresources of the defined resource.

      • allowWorkerActivityUpdates

        @Deprecated
public void allowWorkerActivityUpdates()
        Deprecated. Please use {TaskRouterWorkerCapability.allowActivityUpdates} instead
        Allow a worker to update its own activity status.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if cannot apply policy

      • allowWorkerFetchAttributes

        @Deprecated
public void allowWorkerFetchAttributes()
        Deprecated. Please use {TaskRouterWorkerCapability} instead; added automatically in constructor
        Allow a worker to read its own attributes.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if cannot apply policy

      • allowTaskReservationUpdates

        @Deprecated
public void allowTaskReservationUpdates()
        Deprecated. Please use {TaskRouterWorkerCapability.allowReservationUpdates} instead
        Allow a worker to update task reservation status.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if cannot apply policy

      • addPolicy

        public TaskRouterCapability addPolicy(Policy policy)

      • addPolicy

        public void addPolicy(String url,
                      String method,
                      Map<String,FilterRequirement> queryFilter,
                      Map<String,FilterRequirement> postFilter,
                      boolean allow)
        Add policy to list of access policies.
        Parameters:
        url - url of the resource
        method - method to the resource
        queryFilter - query filter parameters
        postFilter - post filter parameters
        allow - whether or not to allow access on this policy

      • allow

        public void allow(String url,
                  String method,
                  Map<String,FilterRequirement> queryFilter,
                  Map<String,FilterRequirement> postFilter)
        Add Allow access policy.
        Parameters:
        url - url of the resource
        method - method to the resource
        queryFilter - query filter parameters
        postFilter - post filter parameters

      • deny

        public void deny(String url,
                 String method,

        Add Deny access policy.
        Parameters:
        url - url of the resource
        method - method to the resource
        queryFilter - query filter parameters
        postFilter - post filter parameters

      • generateToken

        public String generateToken()
                     throws CapabilityToken.DomainException
        Generate a capability token with the currently-configured policies on this object.
        Returns:
        JSON Web Token representing authorized capabilities
        Throws:
        DomainException - if unable to generate token
        CapabilityToken.DomainException

      • generateToken

        public String generateToken(long ttl)
                     throws CapabilityToken.DomainException
        Generate a capability token with the currently-configured policies on this object.
        Parameters:
        ttl - Expiration time in seconds
        Returns:
        JSON Web Token representing authorized capabilities
        Throws:
        DomainException - if unable to generate token
        CapabilityToken.DomainException
